text: Is it possible to "lock" the folder in the HubSpot UI automatically?
via a code setting when we upload?
not at this time, but there’s a good idea in there. I will pass that along.

Is this kind of thing allowed to set a default img for a module that has a property of `hero_img`:
```{% dnd_module 
path='/path.to.module',
hero_img = { 'src': '<https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hubfs/image.jpeg>' }
%}
{% end_dnd_module %}```
This doesn’t work as is
and by doesn’t work I mean it shows the original default img
